docs.snippet: Emerging competitors, decreasing cable subscriptions and rising political opposition to bundled channels have created a precarious environment for ESPN, which is fighting back....
docs.lead_paragraph: Emerging competitors, decreasing cable subscriptions and rising political opposition to bundled channels have created a precarious environment for ESPN, which is fighting back.
docs.abstract: ESPN has arrived at one of the most precarious moments in its 34-year existence, facing emerging competitors, decreasing cable subscriptions and political opposition to bundled channels; network is fighting back in characteristic style, marshaling its vast economic resources and lobbying prowess to defend its interests. (Series: Remote Control)

headline.main: To Protect Its Empire, ESPN Stays on Offense
headline.print_headline: To Protect Its Empire, ESPN Stays on Offense
